member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfDistanceDecayType
member.summary: Specifies the type of decay applied over distance from the position of an to the position of the listener.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfDistanceDecayType.SpatialAudioHrtfDistanceDecay_NaturalDecay
member.summary: A natural decay over distance, as constrained by minimum and maximum gain distance limits. The output drops to silent at the distance specified by .

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfDistanceDecayType.SpatialAudioHrtfDistanceDecay_CustomDecay
member.summary: A custom gain curve, within the maximum and minimum gain limit.
